name: Home Game (Seven community)
description:
This was our game on UE4 with no an expert team, our objective is teaching ,learning and motivating each other  and people don't know about game development.

This game is our result after 48 hours.
We have learned how to make a game on unreal engine 4 and coding etc...

Our story :

You were aboard, when you came back to visit your family you didn't find them, you just found a letter from your brother for looking for them and you will find an enemy on your way.
You have to find your family before specific time or you will be dead.
You will get adventure and some actions on a game. Have fun :D
